title: Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Voodoo for Peace," Reverse Side", ca. 1984
medium: Black and red marking pen, brush and blue watercolor/ink (?) on white tracing paper
dimensions: 35.5 x 42.5 cm (14 x 16 3/4 in. ), at widest point
description: A four panel screen in the form of four figures.  The upper half of each figure is black; the lower half is white with horizontal, black stripes.  The heads and torsos of four figures are composed of different shapes some with cutouts on torso. Reading from left to right:  figure with large round head and blue arrow on top; figure with rectangular head and red, zig-zag halo on top; figure with headdress of two red cans; figure with head shaped like Greek cross.
